name: Related Articles – Discover the top WordPress plugin for related articles: Simple, Versatile and Powerful
author: KaizenCoders

sections.description:
Returns a list of related entries to display into your posts/pages/etc.

You may configure the appearance, the weights, etc.

It is also possible to display featured images or first images in articles.

This plugin is under GPL licence

Multisite – WordPress MU

This plugin works on a multisite installation of WordPress

Localization

  • English (United States), default language
  • Spanish (Spain) translation provided by DaviddeUgarte
  • French (France) translation provided by SedLex, PigeotCarl, Julien
  • Italian (Italy) translation provided by cervellomacchiato
  • Russian (Russia) translation provided by
  • Vietnamese (Viet Nam) translation provided by
  • Chinese (Taiwan) translation provided by chris

Features of the framework

This plugin uses the SL framework. This framework eases the creation of new plugins by providing tools and frames (see dev-toolbox plugin for more info).

You may easily translate the text of the plugin and submit it to the developer, send a feedback, or choose the location of the plugin in the admin panel.

Have fun !
sections.installation:
1. Upload this folder related-articles to your plugin directory (for instance ‘/wp-content/plugins/’)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to the ‘SL plugins’ box
  4. All plugins developed with the SL core will be listed in this box
  5. Enjoy !
